Staff, rare (requires attunement by a bard, druid, ranger, or wizard)
This staff of silvery-grey ash has been cut from a branch of Yggdrasil and is carved with the Eiwaz rune. Ravenfolk and other dwellers in the World Ash create these staffs to more easily travel its planar pathways.
You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled while holding this staff.
By striking the staff on the ground or against a branch of Yggdrasil as a bonus action, you can transform it into a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.l07uPF7XDuQGBNoe]{shillelagh} (as the spell) for 1 minute.
The staff has 10 charges and regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.
Spells. You can use an action to expend one or more of the staffâ€™s charges to cast one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.JKOLGDy9N2dMsnDp]{create or destroy water} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.ebGqTLYBFxSDf3g7]{freedom of movement} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPlocateredporta]{locate Red Portal} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.4q0CXrxEdSaDWkPU]{purify food and drink} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.HY9kiXpgSNSWwG4w]{speak with plants} (3 charges).
